Text: Thank you for this always looking for Ingmar Bergman Movies, but I need the English subs. What a great Director he was!
The subs are included, use VLC player to play them.
Hmmm a correction he is STILL a GREAT DIRECTOR!

Thanks for this Beksinski! Keep up the good work in preserving extraordinary work right here on pb! 

Note: The credits are quite rapidly cut off the movie. Please don't do this, the movie ends much to abruptly then. Thanks in advance! :>

If you have problems with the subs, get XP to associate the sub file with VLC, then open the sub file, then while still in VLC, open the avi file and you'll get the English subs.  I used VLC v0.8.6c.
